#summary Installation and usage
#labels Phase-Support,Featured

== Installation ==

=== Win32 ===

Extract archive to e.g. c:\vicpack. Launch program with c:\vicpack\vicpack from DOS command line.

Note: Because of a bug in ACME, it's not possible to use drive letters for the image file path with -p option.

=== OS X ===

In Terminal:

  # tar xvzf vicpack-v006-osx.tar.gz
  # cd vicpack-v006-osx
  # sudo cp vicpack /usr/local/bin/
  # sudo cp acme /usr/local/bin/ (optional)

== Usage ==

Some examples can be found in the examples folder.
